launch.title: Welcome to CodexGUI
launch.subtitle: Git repository analysis and LLM conversation logs
launch.invalidKeyError: Invalid API key. Please check and try again.
launch.invalidKeyFormatError: Invalid API key format. It should start with 'sk-'.
launch.sessionExpiredError: Your session has expired. Please re-enter your API key.
launch.rateLimitError: Rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.
launch.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
launch.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
launch.unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
launch.apiKeySecurityNote: Your API key is encrypted and stored locally. It will only be used for CodexGUI operations.
launch.offlineNote: Once validated, you can use most features offline.
launch.securityLevelLowDesc: This API key appears to be shorter than recommended.
launch.securityLevelMediumDesc: This API key has moderate security strength.
launch.securityLevelHighDesc: This API key has good length and complexity.

tokens.loadError: Could not load token usage information
tokens.criticalLevelDescription: Your token usage is critical. Consider upgrading your plan or monitoring your usage closely.
tokens.warningLevelDescription: Your token usage is approaching limit. Consider optimizing your prompts.
tokens.goodLevelDescription: Your token usage is at a healthy level.

projects.title: Your Projects
projects.noProjects: No projects found. Create a new one to get started.
projects.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this project? Only work logs will be deleted, the project folder will remain intact.
